options.content: To enable additional metrics or troubleshoot issues, refer to the Amazon SageMaker HyperPod observability user guide: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/sagemaker/latest/dg/sagemaker-hyperpod-eks-cluster-observability-cluster.html

Tell us how we can improve your Amazon SageMaker HyperPod observability experience by reporting bugs or submitting feature requests here
https://github.com/aws/amazon-sagemaker-feedback/issues
